content: morris baby mitts by wally one these sweet little baby mitts are knit within a few hours and are a wonderful last minute gift size 3 - 6 months width about 6 cm circumference 12 cm length with folded hem 8 cm yarn 15 g fingering weight yarn used here wollmeise pure 100% merino yardage 350m/100 g in colorway campari orange and about 5 g in a contrasting color for the icord needles 2 25 mm and 2 75 mm circular needle if you use magic loop method as described two 2 5 mm dpn s for the icord gauge 28 sts = 10 cm notations tapestry needle techniques knitting basics longtail cast on icord knitting pattern cuff with 2 25 mm circular needle cast on 32 sts using longtail cast on place 16 sts on each needle proceeding in magic loop method pm for beginning of round if you like close to round keep care not to twist knit 22 rounds in 1x1 rib k1 p1 pattern copyright © 2015 wally one pattern no shab4_baby mitts_en the pattern is for personal use only do not reproduce or sell the pattern or sell items that are knitted from this pattern for any questions please contact designed-to-knit@freenet de hand work increases in next round by kfb in stitch 8 16 24 and 32 =36 sts change to needle size 2 75 mm and work 9 ridges in extended garter pattern knit 2 rnds purl 1 round for 27 rnds then work decreases round 1 k4 k2tog 6 times = 30 sts round 2 k to end of round round 3 p3 p2tog 6 times = 24 sts round 4 k to end of round round 5 k2 k2tog 6 times =18 sts round 6 p to end of round round 7 k2tog k5 k2tog 2 times =14 sts break thread after 25 cm and graft together remaining 2 x 7 sts icord co 4 sts with dpn s and work icord until length of 70 cm weave in all ends of gloves wash cut off possibly visible yarn ends fold cuffs in half and with a few stitches sew icord sideways into the inner part of the folded cuffs over a length of 2 cm abbreviations co - cast on st - stitch sts - stitches k knit p purl round - round kfb knit in front and back loop of the same stitch making one k2tog knit two stitches together dpn double pointed needle pm place marker pattern copyright © 2015 wally one pattern no shab4_baby mitts_en the pattern is for personal use only do not reproduce or sell the pattern or sell items that are knitted from this pattern for any questions please contact designed-to-knit@freenet de
